game.name: Wandering Sword
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Wandering Sword is a Chinese martial-arts RPG where you play a young swordsman caught up in a feud and nearly dies. Escaping the event puts you on the path of pursuing the highest form of martial arts and exploring the pugilistic world to become the great hero you are always destined to be.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wandering Sword is a Chinese martial-arts RPG where you play a young swordsman caught up in a feud and nearly dies. Escaping the event puts you on the path of pursuing the highest form of martial arts and exploring the pugilistic world to become the great hero you are always destined to be.

reviewHighlights.text: 스토리가 좋음. 한글패치가 있다곤 하나 부족하기에 게임을 제대로 즐기기는 좀 그럼... 구경만해야하는 의미없는 전투는 스킵이 가능하면 좋겠음. 개인적으로 전투는 재미가 덜한편
